definition[0]: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how
example[0]: Don’t worry, we’ll get the money back somehow.
example[1]: Somehow, I managed to lose my keys.
example[2]: Maybe we could glue it together somehow or other.
definition[1]: for some reason that is not clear to you or that you do not understand
example[3]: Somehow, I just don’t think it’ll work.
